text.0_Part, 7_Line: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
text.0_Part, 3_Line: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
text.0_Part, 5_Line: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
text.0_Part, 2_Line: Come in peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
text.0_Part, 6_Line: Go in peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
text.0_Part, 0_Line: Peace be with you, ministering angels, messengers of the Most High,
text.0_Part, 1_Line: Messengers of the King of Kings, the Holy One, Blessed be He.
text.0_Part, 4_Line: Bless me with peace, messengers of peace, messengers of the Most High,
